post.desc:
One tactic I read to combat this is to go full foreign language. ü§î Though I have a feeling that if we pull that off on Aya, she'd respond in kind also with perfect English...

I just have a feeling that the crow tengu would know English. Assuming the tengu still want to be aware of how the outside world's doing, the kind of information they handle would certainly include English materials gathered from texts that wash up to Gens≈çky≈ç.

Maybe a lot of Kosuzu's stock of outside world books in Suzunaan are from Aya bringing her the ones that have already been processed and discarded.
